definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Most muscle and spinal injuries are from overstrain .
sentences.chinese: 大多數肌肉損傷和脊椎的問題都來自用力過度。

sentences.english: Trouble develops, however, when any human instinct or appetite causes overdeveloped.
sentences.chinese: 但假使人的欲求或喜好過度膨脹則會帶來麻煩。

sentences.english: But if you always need to wipe your hands or often sweat through your clothes, it may be more than a "guy" thing. It could be excessive sweating, called hyperhidrosis.
sentences.chinese: 這是過度出汗，叫做多汗症。

sentences.english: Vitamin C is destroyed when overheated.
sentences.chinese: 維生素C受熱過度就會被破壞。

sentences.english: Don’t overindulge in the comforts of home.
sentences.chinese: 不要過度放縱在家裏的安逸中。

sentences.english: Over-use can cause rebound nasal congestion.
sentences.chinese: 過度使用可能會導致反彈鼻塞。

sentences.english: However, these actions will not cure the post-bubble hangover of the over-extended consumer.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這些行動不會治癒過度消費的後泡沫殘留影響。

sentences.english: Skyscrapers are also lavish consumers, and wasters, of electirc power.
sentences.chinese: 摩天大樓還是電能的過度消費者與浪費者。
對於過度監管的擔憂消失了。

sentences.english: Overtraining can cause other problems besides missed periods.
sentences.chinese: 過度訓練能導致停經以外的其他問題。

sentences.english: Of course overreaction is what terrorists hope to provoke.
sentences.chinese: 當然過度反應恰恰就是恐怖分子希望看到的。

sentences.english: Whether happiness is too heavy and too heavy, excessive use does not itch does not hurt.
sentences.chinese: 是否幸福輕得太沉重，過度使用不癢不痛。

sentences.english: Third, the adverse consequences of overheated investment in some industries are becoming apparent.
sentences.chinese: 三是部分行業過度投資的不良後果開始顯現。

sentences.english: Long hours, inadequate food, and overwork had weakened him.
sentences.chinese: 工作時間長，食物不足，勞累過度累垮了他的身體。

sentences.english: Orange is one colour that would be good in moderation, avoid over-use.
sentences.chinese: 這將是一個橙色很好適中，避免過度使用。

sentences.english: Too abused extrusions also add to this chaotic feeling.
sentences.chinese: 過度使用擠出也給這個模型增添了些混亂的感覺。
